Details: Control your unit with electrical signals sent from the pilot's brain to increase performance. Raise your Speed by 20%. Raise your Shot Attack by 29%. Raise your vernier capacity by 75%.
When Armor is 70% or less, Buff EX Skill effect up 22%
With Technique attribute (self), Enemy Melee power reduced 30%
Middle-Shooter Job, Mid Shot Attack raised 20%
Freely control the heavy weaponry on your back and bombard enemies in all directions. Squad recovers 48% of maximum Armor. Raise Shot Attack of your Squad by 29%.
Physical ranged weapon, reload speed boosted 20%
Fire the Vulcan in your head at foes straight ahead. You can move freely while shooting. Lowers hit enemy Gunpla's Melee and Shot Defense by 14%.
Self-destruct in an explosion that envelops foes around you. Take 90% damage to max Armor.
Unleash a burst of flame at enemies ahead of you from your dragon-shaped arm. Raise your Melee Attack by 19%. Raise your Melee Defense by 19%.
In-Fighter Job, EX Skill CD reduced 20%
Unleash a storm of blows from your lance. Raise your Melee Defense by 19%.
Before 15s pass, Job Gauge increase boosted 17%
Throw your shield to attack.
When Melee ATK is over 16000, Job Gauge increase boosted 17%
While "Support Type", EX Skill piercing boosted 22%
While "Zeon", Projectile speed boosted 14%
With Speed attribute (self), Revive with 30% Armor one time
With Twin Blade category equipped, Melee power boosted 25%
Jump up high and hit foes with a flying kick. Lowers hit enemy Gunpla's Shot Attack by 14%. Lowers hit enemy Gunpla's Melee Defense by 14%
Unleash a barrage of attacks with your twin blades.
While "Zeon", Melee DMG output boosted by 20
When in Multi-Mission Sortie, EX Skill power boosted 25%
When Armor is 60% or less, Vernier Consumption = 0 for 10 sec.
